description.en: Determine if person can attend all meetings.
description.zh-CN: [题目252] Determine if person can attend all meetings....
description.zh-TW: [題目252] Determine if person can attend all meetings....
description.ja: [問題252] Determine if person can attend all meetings....
description.es: [Problema 252] Determine if person can attend all meetings....
description.de: [Problem 252] Determine if person can attend all meetings....
description.fr: [Problème 252] Determine if person can attend all meetings....

explanation.en: APL solution for Meeting Rooms. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Uses iota (⍳) to generate index ranges or find element positions. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Meeting Rooms 的 APL 解决方案。使用等级 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回将对数组排序的索引。使用 tally (≢) 计算数组长度。使用 iota (⍳) 生成索引范围或查找元素位置。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Meeting Rooms 的 APL 解決方案。使用等級 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回將對陣列排序的索引。使用 tally (≢) 計算陣列長度。使用 iota (⍳) 生成索引範圍或查找元素位置。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
explanation.ja: APL solution for Meeting Rooms. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Uses iota (⍳) to generate index ranges or find element positions. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.

Uses iota (⍳) to generate index ranges or find element positions. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
